name: tsrpc-miniapp
description: TSRPC MiniApp Client (Wechat App, QQ App...)

scripts.test: npm run build && cd dist && npm link && cd ../test/server && npm i && cd ../miniapp && npm i && npm run build && cd ../ && START ts-node server && cd .. && echo "请使用开发者工具打开test/miniapp目录完成测试"
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npx rollup -c && cp package.json LICENSE README.md dist/
scripts.build:debug: rm -rf dist && npx tsc -d && cp package.json LICENSE README.md dist/
